name: Coded Ltd
description: Provider of boot camp program services intended to offer coding technology for building a tech startup. The company's program requires basic computer science background having a course curriculum in Python, web designing, Django, java, and software project management that are designed by industry experts and qualified instructors, enabling students and professionals to deploy applications into a production environment easily and prepare for a demanding job market.
one_liner: Provider of boot camp program services intended to offer coding technology for building a tech startup. The company's program requires basic computer science background having a course curriculum in Python, web designing, Django, java, and software project management that are designed by industry experts and qualified instructors, enabling students and professionals to deploy applications into a production environment easily and prepare for a demanding job market.
